name: Phi Phi Island Timetable
values: Arrive at Phi Phi Don, transfer to your accommodation, and settle in.
Walk around Tonsai Village, explore local shops, and hike to Phi Phi Viewpoint for sunset.
Full-day boat tour to the iconic Maya Bay (from 'The Beach'), swimming and snorkeling in Pileh Lagoon.
Speedboat trip to the pristine Bamboo Island for relaxation on white sands and snorkeling in clear waters.
Afternoon snorkeling adventure at Shark Point to observe marine life, including harmless reef sharks.
Visit the mysterious Viking Cave for ancient paintings, then relax and spot monkeys at Monkey Beach.
Enjoy a scenic sunset cruise around the islands, possibly including dinner and squid fishing.
Free time for beach relaxation, enjoying a final Thai massage, souvenir shopping, and preparing for departure.
Check-out from accommodation and transfer to the pier for your departure from Phi Phi Island.
